May
Twenty-seventh
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Novik:
Perhaps you will recall that one of the
problems concerning the non-commercial educaÂ¬
tional station is that of the restricted list
given us by A.3.C.A.P. I believe that you
were going to see Mr. Buck at some convenient
time and get from him permission for us to
use these restricted numbers, providing they
were not used on the air more than once a day
or some such agreement.
Cordially,
FSS/rep
Frank E. Schooley
